patches.name: Unofficial Fallout 4 Patch
patches.desc: A comprehensive bugfixing mod for Fallout 4.

patches.name: F4SE
patches.desc: This modifies the game files to allow other mods much more freedom to integrate with the game. Essential for many mods.

patches.name: Achievements
patches.desc: Uses F4SE to re-enable achievements while mods are active

patches.name: High FSP Physics Fix
patches.desc: Untie the game speed from the framerate. Fixes physical bugs. Reduces loading time.

patches.name: Armor and Weapon Keywords Community Resource
patches.desc: This mod adds a new armor and weapon system to allow other mods to work together more seamlessly.

patches.name: Workshop Framework
patches.desc: Framework to open up the settlement system to editing by the community.

ui.name: Mod Configuration Menu
ui.desc: Adds a menu similar to the MCM in Skyrim. It provides a central location for mod configuration, accessible via the Pause menu.

ui.name: LooksMenu
ui.desc: Overhauls the character creation menu to allow for much more customization.

ui.name: Full Dialogue Interface
ui.desc: Makes the game display the full lines of what your character is going to say in conversation, instead of just a paraphrase.

ui.name: HUDFramework
ui.desc: Adds a framework that allows other mods to add new UI elements to the HUD.

ui.name: See Through Scopes
ui.desc: Adds see-through (so no scope overlay) Combat Scopes to various weapons.
